meta.title: Kintsugi
meta.description: Kintsugi is interBTC’s canary network, developed by Interlay under the supervision of Kintsugi Labs, a non-profit oriented organization responsible for Kintsugi’s launch and the support of the decentralized network and ecosystem.

title: Kintsugi
